metadata.synopsis: a goblin participating in a large raid - speaks maliciously about killing the youngsters at the raid target

1.speaker: Warrior Rua
1.text: Goblin kids would 'ave put up a better fight.
1.context: NodeContext: malicious - describing a child who tried to fight back during an attack

0.speaker: Warrior Rua
0.text: Killed my first human when I was five years old. Tieflings are soft.
0.context: NodeContext: malicious glee - talking about killing a tiefling child
